Auckland Anniversary floods: Father of victim Daniel Miller finds comfort in diary https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-floods-father-of-victim-daniel-miller-finds-comfort-in-diary/NPKSO2SGZBF5BBCTR6MPGNJKX4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-floods-father-of-victim-daniel-miller-finds-comfort-in-diary/NPKSO2SGZBF5BBCTR6MPGNJKX4/ Cherie HowieHis son just wanted to help, but Steve Miller is urging others to "leave it to the pros".
